channel.title: How do I make a 508 client connect to my remote server?
channel.description: I am trying to play with a friend and he cannot connect to my server. It hangs on connecting to update server. I have opened port 43594 and tested it with a port tester and it is open. I get an error_game_js5connect error in client. What am I doing wrong?

item.title: How do I make a 508 client connect to my remote server?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Hmm you know teamviewer? Add my msn, its on my profle.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a 508 client connect to my remote server?
item.dc:creator: @low93bowtie low93bowtie
item.description:
@low93bowtie wrote:

that’s where it is…

Posted on: May 29, 2009, 02:30:50 pm

I get a message on server that there is a connection from xx.xx.xx…x ip, but it still does nothing on client… HELP

item.title: How do I make a 508 client connect to my remote server?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You either don’t have the cache in the right directory, or the server that your client is attempting to connect to is offline.
